AMD - Engineering - Full-time - Austin, TX - Onsite/Hybrid

The GPU virtualization team works on enabling SRIOV virtualization for AMD Instinct Accelerators for HPC and AI/Machine Learning, such as MI300X, and AMD Radeon Pro GPUs for Cloud Gaming + VDI. We also collaborate with Cloud Service Providers like AWS and Microsoft Azure to provide platform software enabling our AMD solution.

There's a lot of incredibly exciting work up ahead, and we're looking for passionate engineers to join us in the following roles!

Software Engineer: https://careers.amd.com/careers-home/jobs/47820?lang=en-us

DevOps/Verification Engineer: https://careers.amd.com/careers-home/jobs/48527?lang=en-us
